name: Power Orbs
description:
File is a zip file that will need to be opened once it is down loaded.

Player 1 is the Green and Silver sprite and Player 2 is the Red and Gold sprite.

WASD and the arrow keys are for movement for both players. To shoot, player 1 uses the SHIFT button while player 2 uses the SPACE bar.

Sprites are in the style used for Nintendo's Pokemon franchise.
